data.author: Thomas Paine
data.quote: We have it in our power to begin the world over again.

data.author: John Donne
data.quote: Be thine own palace, or the world's thy jail.

data.author: Whoopi Goldberg
data.quote: We're born with success. It is only others who point out our failures, and what they attribute to us as failure.

data.author: Richard Branson
data.quote: Too many people measure how successful they are by how much money they make or the people that they associate with. In my opinion, true success should be measured by how happy you are.

data.author: Richard Branson
data.quote: Overcoming fear is the first step to success for entrepreneurs. The winners all exemplify that, and the hard work and commitment they have shown underlines what is needed to set up a business.

data.author: Charles de Montesquieu
data.quote: In most things success depends on knowing how long it takes to succeed.

data.author: Bernard Meltzer
data.quote: Success is getting and achieving what you want. Happiness is wanting and being content with what you get.

data.author: Chance The Rapper
data.quote: Fame or perceived success - it all comes from groupthink.

data.author: Sumner Redstone
data.quote: Success is not built on success. It's built on failure. It's built on frustration. Sometimes its built on catastrophe.

data.author: Robert Henri
data.quote: Do whatever you do intensely.

data.author: Bruce Henderson
data.quote: The essential element of successful strategy is that it derives its success from the differences between competitors with a consequent difference in their behavior.

data.author: Lee Ann Womack
data.quote: I think you can have moderate success by copying something else, but if you really want to knock it out of the park, you have to do something different and take chances.

data.author: Warren Bennis
data.quote: Success in management requires learning as fast as the world is changing.

data.author: Christopher Reeve
data.quote: Don't give up. Don't lose hope. Don't sell out.

data.author: Ernest Istook
data.quote: Instead of this confusion, we need the unifying force of an official language, English, which is the language of success in America.

data.author: Louis Pasteur
data.quote: Let me tell you the secret that has led me to my goal. My strength lies solely in my tenacity.

data.author: Nicki Minaj
data.quote: You wanna know what scares people? Success. When you don't make moves and when you don't climb up the ladder, everybody loves you because you're not competition.

data.author: Mike Pence
data.quote: The Patriot Act is essential to our continued success in the war on terror here at home.

data.author: Aretha Franklin
data.quote: It really is an honor if I can be inspirational to a younger singer or person. It means I've done my job.

data.author: Max Lucado
data.quote: You change your life by changing your heart.
